ygData.subject: RE: Dual Wield
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought that at 16th level and above you should not give your pet a weapon because he did more damage barehanded.  Am I wrong about this? ... From: Mark
ygData.messageBody:
I thought that at 16th level and above you should not give your pet a weapon
because he did more damage barehanded. Am I wrong about this?

-----Original Message-----
From: Mark Muller [mailto:markm@...]
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 11:49 PM
To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] Dual Wield


From: "Mark Muller" <markm@...>

24 or 29, I forget which...also there's a "feature" where if both weapons
are exactly the same (two rusty daggers, two fs daggers) only one shows
up...

----- Original Message -----
From: <Aazen1@...>
To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, October 25, 1999 5:45 PM
Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] Dual Wield


> From: Aazen1@...
>
> At what lvl can your pet wield two weapons at the same time?
>
> Thanks in Advance!
> Aazen
>
> > This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not
be
tolerated
>

This list is basically unmoderated. However abusive language will not be
tolerated
